name: Dominari Tournament
description:
Dominari Tournament- 4X RTS

Dominari Tournament is an intense and addictive 4X Space Real-Time Strategy game where you explore, expand, exploit, and dominate a solar system while a real-life enemy attempts to do the same. Dominari Tournament demands fast reflexes, quick thinking, situational awareness, and resource management while delivering an edge of your seat real-time experience. The more you play, the more depth of strategy and tactics you will uncover.

How will your war end?

FEATURES
  • Compete head-to-head against live players on STEAM
  • Practice your game openers and strategies against an artificially intelligent enemy.
  • Battles, on average, last 5 to 20 minutes, depending upon player skill level.
  • Uncover unique strategies to outsmart your opponent.
  • Unlock and upgrade 20 unique abilities that can be combined to unleash devastating attacks.
  • Conquer enemy planets while protecting your own with layered defenses.
  • Play at higher skill levels requires precision timing, quick thinking, and fast reflexes.
  • Original musical score designed to amp up the experience
  • Symmetrical maps ensure a balanced match.
  • Procedurally generated maps make each war 100% unique.
